text: Timiharu yud'dha garna kina tayara humdainau, jasale aphna sapathala'i tode ra paigambarala'i gharabata nikalne prayasama chan. Ra svayam nai pahilopataka uniharule timiharu virud'dha (yud'dhako) pahala gare. Ke timi unisita dara manchau? Yadi timi momin hau bhane yasako dherai hakadara allaha cha ki timi unisita dara mana
